#summary authenticateREST.php
#labels authenticate,REST,authenticateREST,php,API

=authenticateREST.php=

==Files Included==
require_once('configREST.php');     //sql connection information<br>
require_once('bootstrapREST.php');  //link information<br>
<br>
Input: https://[URL]/Authenticate.php?u=[username]&password=[pass]<br>
Output: XML
  *   result  {{{[0 or 1]}}}  if user and pass is correct<br>
  *   key     {{{[hashed key]}}} validate auth was performed on this WS<br>
<br>
Example Output:<br>
  {{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
      <result>    1       </result>
      <key>       fb504a91465213203ae7c3866bbf3cf4</key>
      <userID>    12345   </userID>
      <AccessType>400     </type>
}}}
